1.19.18  7:59 pm   For those little vocal fillers that lead into the chorus of la de da, like 'and it goes' or 'singin' or the quick 'i said' (I think thats what you say?) before the la de da d-de dum de da, d-d-dim dwaayah d-de dum dweeAyy part... Are those written into the lyrics when you wrote the song, or do you just kind of toss those in when you're singing?
1.19.18  7:49 pm   do you have a go-to karaoke song?

1.19.18  7:46 pm   Hey Bill, there is this syncopated rhythm that I want to write down for future reference (I don't want to record it 'cause I feel like future me won't interpret it quite right), but I can't tell what it is. I can replicate it physically, but when I put it to a metronome, it's too fast to tell, and when I slow it down, I start to subconsciously nudge notes towards or away from the beat, and it becomes a whole new rhythm. How do I find out what the rhythm is?

1.19.18  6:43 pm   I think the lines about the windmills in La de da de da de da de da de day oh is similar to its corresponding lines in the first two verses, "Where did all the good times go" is self explanatory, "Where did all the bad times roll" sound as if you are wondering where the bad times came from, and "when did all the windmills start to turn so slow" is like a metaphor about how the wind has stopped, like the good times stopping.

At least that's my take on that line. You said it just fits but I think it actually makes sense.

Is that the case?

1.19.18  8:30 am   Ignore every idiot?

1.19.18  7:32 am   sometimes i feel like all of your songs are connected, in one way or another. i feel as if you wished you werent trapped in this comedian bubble

      and your music was actually taken seriously and not just as a joke.

     the visuals that accompany your videos are merely funny and maybe you dont to be seen as a musician that isnt taken seriously because of their sense of humour, and "i want to be a movie star" is about you wanting to be famous for somthjng that IS taken seriously,

      and la de da de da de da de day oh is about you reminiscing on the past when you were taken legitimately and life was all good and you didnt have to feel the pressure of people always demanding videos...

     

but hey, thats just a theory,

A GAME THEORY
